circle.name: Circle
circle.description: No video. No customization. Basic forum.

skool.name: Skool
skool.description: Cookie-cutter design. No calls. Same as everyone.

failingSection.title: Why They're
failingSection.subtitle: Let's be real about what you're NOT getting with Circle, Skool & Teachable

noVideo.title: No Built-in Video Calls
noVideo.problem: Circle & Skool force you to use Zoom/Google Meet. More tools = more friction = lower engagement.
noVideo.solution: Unytea: 1-click video calls with recording, transcription, and screen sharing built-in.

noCustomization.title: Zero Customization
noCustomization.problem: Every Skool community looks identical. Circle's 'customization' is just changing a logo color.
noCustomization.solution: Unytea: Full branding control. Custom domains. Your colors. Your fonts. Your CSS.

noEngagement.title: No Real Engagement Tools
noEngagement.problem: Basic forums and courses. No accountability. No member matching. Just another dead community.
noEngagement.solution: Unytea: Buddy System matches members for accountability. AI-powered engagement insights.

overpriced.title: Overpriced for What You Get
overpriced.problem: Circle: $399/mo for a forum. Skool: $99/mo but everyone's community looks the same. Teachable: Great for courses, terrible for community.
overpriced.solution: Unytea: $129/mo for everything. Video calls, AI, customization, and actual innovation.

ancientTech.title: Ancient Technology
ancientTech.problem: Built 5-10 years ago. Slow page loads. Clunky UX. No real-time features. WebRTC from 2015.
ancientTech.solution: Unytea: 2024 tech. WebSockets. 0ms latency. Modern React. Built for today's communities.

vendorLock.title: Vendor Lock-in
vendorLock.problem: Try exporting your Circle data. Good luck. They make it nearly impossible to leave.
vendorLock.solution: Unytea: One-click export. API access. Own your data. Leave anytime. We'll even help you migrate.
